member.name: T:Utilities.Shared.Data
member.summary: This class contains a generic way to build data from specific source such as DbDataReader or from object itself

member.name: M:Utilities.Shared.Data.RowBuilderHighStrict``1(System.Data.Common.DbDataReader)
member.summary: Convert DbDataReader into POCO object using reflection using implicit inference (torelance for mismatch data type but slower down the building process)
member.param: data reader to convert to POCO object

member.name: M:Utilities.Shared.Data.RowBuilderLowStrict``1(System.Data.Common.DbDataReader)
member.summary: Convert DbDataReader into POCO object using reflection using explicit inference (can cause the property to be default or null if mismatch data type but has a significant improved speed compare to implicitly style.)
member.param: data reader to convert to POCO object

member.name: M:Utilities.Shared.Data.RowBuilder``1(System.Data.Common.DbDataReader)
member.summary: Convert DbDataReader into POCO object using reflection with unsafe operation (superior in speed but had no consistency guaruntee)

member.name: M:Utilities.Shared.Data.RowBuilder(System.Data.Common.DbDataReader,System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{System.String})
member.summary: Convert DbDataReader into dynamic object with specified column name
member.param: data reader to convert to dynamic object

member.name: M:Utilities.SQL.DatabaseConnector`2.Select``1
member.summary: Select all rows from table (table name is a class name or specific [Table] attribute, an attribute has higher priority).

member.summary: Select one row from table from given primary key (primary key can be set by [PrimaryKey] attribute, table name is a class name or specific [Table] attribute, an attribute has higher priority).

member.summary: Insert row into table (table name is a class name or specific [Table] attribute, an attribute has higher priority).

member.summary: Update specific object into table (table name is a class name or specific [Table] attribute, an attribute has higher priority).

member.summary: Delete given object from table by inference of [PrimaryKey] attribute. (table name is a class name or specific [Table] attribute, an attribute has higher priority).

member.summary: Update specific object into table (table name is a class name or specific [Table] attribute, an attribute has higher priority).
